mapper.select: select substr(img_path, 2) from `banner_img` union select substr(review_path, 2) from `review_img` union select substr(img_path, 2) from `product_img`

SELECT member_no, product_no, click_date, img_path FROM ((SELECT *, ( SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM (SELECT member_no, product_no, click_date, img_path FROM click LEFT JOIN `product_img` USING(product_no) WHERE thumb_fl = 'Y' AND member_no = ${memberNo}) b WHERE click_date > a.click_date ) AS RANK FROM (SELECT member_no, product_no, click_date, img_path FROM click LEFT JOIN `product_img` USING(product_no) WHERE thumb_fl = 'Y' AND member_no = ${memberNo}) AS a ORDER BY RANK ASC) ) main WHERE RANK > 1 and RANK < 5
